abstract: The Dutch operator of Vision Express in Britain and Générale d’Optique in France said it expected to price its stock at €17.50 to €21.50 a share, valuing it at up to about $6 billion.
snippet: The Dutch operator of Vision Express in Britain and Générale d’Optique in France said it expected to price its stock at €17.50 to €21.50 a share, valuing it at up to about $6 billion.

headline.main: GrandVision Plans to Raise Up to $1.2 Billion in Amsterdam I.P.O.
